content.rendered:
Directed by Khalid Rahman

Written by Ashraf Hamza. Muhsin Parari

Cast Tovino Thomas (Waseem). Kalyani Priyadarshan (Beepathu). Shine Tom Chacko (S. I. Reji Mathew). Chemban Vinod Jose (Omega Babu). Binu Pappu (Kalapurakkal David). Lukman Lukku (Jamshi). Gokulan (Rajan). Swathi Das Prabhu (Sathaar). Adhri Joe (Vikas). Austin Dan (Rajesh). Assim Jamal (Beepathu’s Brother). Shafi Kollam (Aliyan). V.P Khalid (Priest). Noushad Ali (Siyad). James Elia (J. P. Kodoor). Salim Kumar (Singer (Cameo)). Unni Raja (Suku)

Languages Malayalam

Producers Ashiq Usman

Production Ashiq Usman Productions. Plan B Motion Pictures
